RadialGeometry - Class in geometries
RadialGeometry class is an abstract class for all geometric shapes in space that have a radius
RadialGeometry(double) - Constructor for class geometries.RadialGeometry
Constructs and initialized a RadialGeometry object by radius.
RadialGeometry(RadialGeometry) - Constructor for class geometries.RadialGeometry
Copy constructor
RadialGeometry(Color, double) - Constructor for class geometries.RadialGeometry
Constructs and initialized a RadialGeometry object by radius and color
RadialGeometry(Color, Material, double) - Constructor for class geometries.RadialGeometry
Constructs and initialized a RadialGeometry object by radius, color and material
Ray - Class in primitives
Class Ray, basic object in geometry - group of point's that represent a ray.
Ray(Point3D, Vector) - Constructor for class primitives.Ray
Constructs and initialized a Ray object.
Ray(Point3D, Vector, Vector) - Constructor for class primitives.Ray
constructor that used also for moving the point out of the object, the point will be exactly at the intersection with the object.
Ray(Ray) - Constructor for class primitives.Ray
Copy constructor
reduce(double) - Method in class primitives.Color
Scale the color by (1 / reduction factor)
ReflectionRefractionTests - Class in unittests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
ReflectionRefractionTests() - Constructor for class unittests.ReflectionRefractionTests
 
Render - Class in renderer
class Render, responsible to take all the calculation of ray intersections and light, and to create a picture from that.
Render(ImageWriter, Scene) - Constructor for class renderer.Render
constructor to initialized class Render
renderer - package renderer
 
renderImage() - Method in class renderer.Render
this function responsible for fill up the pixels matrix from the scene, it receive from the scene the colors for each pixel and fill the matrix in the image writer
RenderTests - Class in unittests
Test rendering abasic image
RenderTests() - Constructor for class unittests.RenderTests
